text: Factions In the Palpagos Islands, Factions exist with their own goals, and many are enemies to players. Each faction rules certain territories, and their ruler is located in a ’ Tower. Led by Officer Marcus Dryden, § PIDF (Palpagos Islands Defense Force) is the (corrupt) law enforcement faction, if you commit a (crime they will spawn in batches of 5 being higher level than the player, potentially one shot the player.
